alert.note: Alert for Cape Girardeau; Perry; Scott (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 11:32AM CDT until May 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Missouri... Illinois... Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau and Thebes. .Recent heavy rainfall upstream will gradually move water levels from minor to moderate flood stage next week. For the Mississippi River...including Cape Girardeau, Thebes... Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH NEXT SATURDAY AFTERNOON, MAY 14TH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River at Cape Girardeau. * WHEN...Until Saturday Afternoon, May 14th. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, The flood gate at Broadway closes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 33.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 38.0 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Stay tuned to further developments by listening to your local radio, television, or NOAA Weather Radio for further information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
